accommodation.name: Harbin Wei Ye Hotel
accommodation.location: 32 Jihong Street, Daoli District, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent location in the heart of Harbin near Orthodox Church ruins and Zhongyang Street. 5 minutes walk to Ice and Snow World area. Safe neighborhood with easy access to Russian architecture district. Highly rated 4.5/5 by travelers.

accommodation.name: Harbin Wei Ye Hotel
accommodation.location: 32 Jihong Street, Daoli District, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
accommodation.notes: Same hotel for night 2. Walking distance to Sun Island Park and Siberian Tiger Park. Convenient base for exploring northeast cuisine restaurants.

accommodation.name: Kind Hotel Tianjin
accommodation.location: 15 Ziyou Avenue, Italian Style Street, Hebei District, Tianjin
accommodation.notes: Perfect location directly on Italian Style Street. Walking distance to Tianjin Eye (3km), Ancient Culture Street, and Five Great Avenues. Excellent 5/5 rating. Quiet and well-maintained property.

accommodation.name: Moxy Xi'an Downtown
accommodation.location: 282 Xiyi Road, Xincheng District, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province
accommodation.notes: Modern boutique hotel near Bell Tower and Muslim Quarter. 5-minute walk to Zhonglou metro station. Exceptional 4.8/5 rating with praised service. Free laundry room with washing machines and dryer. Perfect for solo travelers. Near night markets.

accommodation.name: Moxy Xi'an Downtown
accommodation.location: 282 Xiyi Road, Xincheng District, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province
accommodation.notes: Same hotel for night 2 in Xi'an. Convenient for City Wall cycling, Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, and Shaanxi History Museum tours. Close to Tang Dynasty Ever-Bright City nightlife.

accommodation.name: Scholars Hotel PingJiangFu Suzhou
accommodation.location: 60 Baita East Road, Gusu District, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province
accommodation.notes: Beautiful traditional-style hotel near Pingjiang Road ancient street and canal. 3 minutes walk to Humble Administrator's Garden. Next to shopping area with picturesque canal views. Excellent location for Suzhou Museum visits. Rated 4.4/5.

accommodation.name: Hangzhou West Lake Hubin Yintai Atour Hotel
accommodation.location: Jingjin Mansion, 228 Zhonghe Middle Road, Shangcheng District, Hangzhou
accommodation.notes: Popular location near West Lake scenic area. 20-minute walk to Hubin Yintai and West Lake waterfront. Excellent breakfast service. Great base for visiting Lingyin Temple and Longjing Tea Village. Rated 4.7/5. Modern facilities.

accommodation.name: Holiday Inn Express Guilin City Center
accommodation.location: 30 Yiren Road, Xiufeng District, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent central location next to main food and shopping areas. Right across from People's Square. 5-minute walk to Li River departure point. Free self-service laundry on breakfast floor. Spacious rooms. Rated 4.4/5. Perfect for early Li River cruise departure.

accommodation.name: The Bamboo Leaf Yangshuo
accommodation.location: 48 Shibanqiao Village, Yangshuo County, Guilin, Guangxi Province
accommodation.notes: Peaceful resort setting 8 minutes walk from Li River cruise drop-off point. 20-minute walk or short cycle to Yangshuo town and West Street. Swimming pool and excellent restaurant. Very helpful English-speaking staff. Free bike rental for Ten-Mile Gallery. Rated 4.7/5. Perfect for Yulong River rafting base.

accommodation.name: Hilton Garden Inn Zhangjiajie Wulingyuan
accommodation.location: 108 Baofeng Road, Wulingyuan District, Zhangjiajie, Hunan Province
accommodation.notes: Brand new hotel opened in 2025 in quiet Wulingyuan area near National Forest Park entrance. Exceptional service with helpful staff arranging park tickets and transportation. Excellent breakfast. Huge spacious rooms. Free laundry machines. Perfect location for Avatar Hallelujah Mountain and Tianzi Mountain cable car. Rated 4.7/5.

accommodation.name: ARTHUR HOTEL CANTON TOWER GUANGZHOU
accommodation.location: 375 Xingang Middle Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes: Excellent location one metro stop from Canton Tower. Very close to Kecun metro station (Exit B). Walking distance to Canton Tower and Pearl River. Modern facilities with helpful front desk. Highly rated 4.5/5. Perfect for exploring Shamian Island and Chen Clan Ancestral Hall before high-speed train to Shenzhen.

accommodation.name: Hyatt Place Shenzhen Dongmen
accommodation.location: 3018 Jianshe Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province
accommodation.notes: Huge rooms with king bed and living area. Less than 100m from Laojie metro station (Exit H). Located in/beside 1234Space shopping mall at Dongmen Pedestrian Street. Perfect location for crossing to Hong Kong at Luohu Port (2 metro stops). Daily breakfast included. Rated 4.3/5.

accommodation.name: Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong
accommodation.location: 50 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
accommodation.notes: Prime location directly at Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (N5 exit). Walking distance to Victoria Peak tram, Star Ferry, and Temple Street Night Market. Heart of Tsim Sha Tsui shopping district. Convenient for day trip to Lantau Island (Tian Tan Buddha) and ferry to Macau. Rated 4.1/5. Request renovated room if available.

notes: All accommodations selected for mid-to-high range quality with excellent locations for planned activities. Pricing is per night in CNY for mainland China locations and HKD for Hong Kong (converted to CNY equivalent for display). Total accommodation cost for 13 nights: approximately CNY 6,350 (â‚¬800). Hotels chosen based on: proximity to attractions, safety, English-speaking staff where available, and high guest ratings (4.0+/5). For Hong Kong, note that prices are significantly higher due to location premium. All hotels can be booked via major booking platforms (Booking.com, Trip.com, Agoda) or directly. Advance booking recommended, especially for Harbin (winter season) and Zhangjiajie (popular park area).
